brandMessage: At Renu Oberoi Luxury Jewellery, we celebrate the art of fine craftsmanship and timeless beauty. Our creations are for the discerning, sophisticated woman who values elegance and exclusivity.

toneOfVoice.description: Our tone of voice is luxurious, elegant, and aspirational, designed to engage a high-end clientele while maintaining a personal connection.

examples.message: Indulge in the joy of owning a masterpiece, crafted just for you.
examples.context: Used for celebratory moments like new collections, festive seasons, or customer appreciation.

examples.message: We extend our heartfelt support to you during these trying times.
examples.context: Used in messages of condolence or during sensitive times, expressing empathy and support.

examples.message: We are honored to present our exclusive collection, featuring the finest diamonds and gemstones.
examples.context: Used for official announcements, product launches, or high-profile events.

colorDescription: Our brand embraces timeless sophistication with a palette that includes rich golds, royal purples, and deep jewel tones like emerald and ruby. These colors symbolize luxury, opulence, and elegance.

fontUsage.headings: Elegant serif font for headings, symbolizing the timelessness and refinement of our designs.
fontUsage.body: Clean sans-serif font for body text to ensure readability while maintaining a luxurious feel.

socialMediaGuidelines.toneForPosts: Exclusive, elegant, and celebratory. Posts should feel aspirational and offer a glimpse into the luxurious world of high-end jewelry.

additionalNotes: Avoid overly casual language. Maintain exclusivity in all communication, ensuring that the tone reflects the premium nature of the brand.
